main.name: Hojjat Gohargazi
main.description: Experienced Software designer and java developer with a demonstrated history of working in the banking industry. Skilled in Spring (boot, data, AOP, security), JPA and Hibernate. Strong engineering professional with a Master of Science (M.Sc.) focused in Computer, Software Engineering from Tarbiat Modares University.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Hojjat Gohargazi must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
